property.name: Outfit
property.value: 108 Righteous Bandits

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Grifter-Blessed 0-Kung Fu 0

property.name: Text
property.value: React, Boot: At the start of the game, you may discard a card to draw a card.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: 108 Righteous Bandits

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution, Boot: Ace Jacc to make the opposing posse suffer 2 extra casualties.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: 108 Righteous Bandits

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Experienced 1-Kung Fu 2

property.name: Text
property.value: Bai Yang Chen cannot have attachments.While Bai Yang Chen is in a posse, after each shootout play (including passing), remove any modifiers to his bullet rating, set it to 5, and then reduce it by 1 for each card in your hand.Noon: If you have no ghost rock in your stash, draw a card.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: 108 Righteous Bandits

property.name: Text
property.value: After using Huang Li's Shootout ability:• if you booted a Blessed dude, unboot another dude in the shootout.• if you booted an Abomination, Huang Li gets +2 bullets.• if you booted a Kung Fu dude, boot an opposing dude.Shootout: Boot your dude (in this shootout) to discard a card and draw a card.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Grifter-Mad Scientist 0

property.name: Text
property.value: React, Boot: At the start of the game, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may discard them, shuffle them into your deck, or return them to your deck in the same order. Take 1 ghost rock from the bank and add it to the pot for the Gamblin' phase.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin' Resolution: Boot Dick or his Horse to send any number of your dudes with Horses home booted. If your hand is legal, those dudes do not boot.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Pay 4 Ghost Rock: Al permanently has +1 bullets, +1 influence, is a stud, and loses this ability.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: While at a location you own, Aunt Lou is a stud.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Grifter-Huckster 0

property.name: Text
property.value: React, Boot At the start of the game, look at the top 6 cards of your deck. You may discard a card from your hand to reveal an Abomination or non-Unique Mystical goods and add it to your play hand. Return the other cards in your deck in the same order.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: Ace Mourning Mist to boot a dude at this or an adjacent location.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Huckster 0

property.name: Text
property.value: Victor has a bonus to his Huckster skill equal to the number of Abominations at his location. This bonus cannot exceed +4.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: The Angler calls out a dude at his location who has the same value.Noon: Discard a card to change The Angler's value to that card's value.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Eagle Wardens

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Grifter-Shaman 0

property.name: Text
property.value: React, Boot: At the start of the game, you may draw a card and then discard a card. If you discard a Spirit or Technique, draw a card.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Eagle Wardens

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Kung Fu 1

property.name: Text
property.value: While there are no Weapons in the opposing posse, Lewis is a stud.While there is another dude in your posse, Lewis has \Shootout, Boot:\ Choose and boot an opposing dude with a lower value. Neither dude contributes to draw hands unless they are the only dude in their posse.\

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Eagle Wardens

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Experienced 1-Shaman 3

property.name: Text
property.value: While at a location with a Totem, Duncan is a stud.React: After you play a Totem at Duncan's location, draw a card if it is the only Totem with that name at that location.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Eagle Wardens

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Shaman 0

property.name: Text
property.value: While Yiska has a Sidekick, he has +2 bullets.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Grifter-Mad Scientist 0

property.name: Text
property.value: React, Boot: At the start of the game, search your deck for two different non-Unique Gadget Weapons and reveal them. Your opponent chooses one to discard. Attach the other to one of your dudes, paying its ghost rock cost (without inventing). Discard a card.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: While your draw hand is cheatin', Seth lowers your hand rank by his bullet rating if he is in your posse.React: After you use a Cheatin' Resolution ability on an action card, unboot Seth.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Experienced 1-Deputy

property.name: Text
property.value: Repeat React: After your opponent reveals a cheatin' hand, unboot Clint.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Blessed 1

property.name: Text
property.value: React Before you take casualties, if Mimi is in your posse you may discard a Miracle from your hand to suffer 1 fewer casualties this round. If your hand is legal, you suffer 2 fewer casualties instead.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: While Sam is in your posse, Cheatin' Resolution abilities on action cards cost +1 ghost rock.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Grifter-Huckster 0

property.name: Text
property.value: React, Boot: At the start of the game, discard 2 cards from your hand to draw 2 cards.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: If there are more dudes in your posse than in the opposing posse, give Jack 1 bounty to make him a stud.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Reggie has a bullet bonus equal to the number of Hucksters in his posse. This bonus cannot exceed +4.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Alferd is in your posse, your opponent gains \Repeat Shootout, Pay 3 Ghost Rock: Alferd joins your posse, under y0our control.\

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Experienced 1-Agent

property.name: Text
property.value: While John has a Gadget Weapon, he is a stud. John cannot trade away his goods.React: After John enters play, attach a Gadget Weapon from your hand or discard pile to him, paying its ghost rock cost (without inventing). If the Gadget comes from your hand, reduce its cost to 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: Discard Willa Mae to send a dude in your posse home. If your opponent's hand is cheatin', unboot that dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the New Varney Nosferatu is in a Public location at the beginning of High Noon, send it home booted.

property.name: Text
property.value: This deed has +1 production and +1 control points if there is a Horse at this deed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon Job, Boot: Mark this deed. If successful, discard this deed to choose a deed in your discard pile and play it, reducing its cost by 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Discard 2 cards. Choose a non-Unique card in your discard pile that matches the suit of one of the discarded cards and the value of the other discarded card, and put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Shootout, Boot: If the shootout is at this deed, each dude in the shootout becomes a draw.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time a deed is played, gain 1 ghost rock.Controller Noon, Boot: Discard a card from your hand to boot a deed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Choose a dude at this or an adjacent location. That dude has +1 to each of their skill ratings (the skills are Mad Scientist, Blessed, Huckster, and Shaman).

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon/Shootout, Boot, Pay 1 ghost rock: Boot or unboot a dude at this deed.

property.name: Text
property.value: This deed has +1 control points for each player with a dude at this deed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: Choose a dude at this location. Look at a random card in their controller's hand.Shootout, Boot: Look at a random card in your opponent's hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gadget 4-Attire

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude may not boot to join a posse at an adjacent location.Resolution, Boot: Discard a card from your hand to have your posse suffer 1 fewer casualties this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin' Resolution, Boot: You may send an opposing dude without a Horse home booted. If your hand is legal, you suffer X fewer casualties this round, where X is this dude's bullet rating.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gadget 7-Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: Repeat Shootout: Kinetic Accretion Actualizer has an additional +1 bullets until Sundown. You may use this ability once per shootout round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin' Resolution Hex 5, Boot: Reduce your opponent's hand rank by the total number of Sidekicks and dudes in their posse, to a maximum of 4.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Hex 7, Boot: This dude's call outs cannot be refused. Discard this Hex.

property.name: Text
property.value: React Miracle X, Boot: When a dude in this shootout is being discarded as a casualty, send that dude home booted instead. X is that dude's grit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Miracle 6: Choose another dude at this or an adjacent location. That dude has +2 to each of their skill ratings (the skills are Huckster, Blessed, Shaman, and Mad Scientist). If they do not have a skill, this dude has +1 bullets.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout Spirit 5, Boot: If there are more dudes in your posse than the opposing posse, boot an opposing card. If you succeed by 4 or more, choose one of your dudes. That dude has + bullets.

property.name: Text
property.value: Can only attach to a deed.Noon Spirit 8, Boot: Choose a dude without a Weapon. That dude has +X bullets. X is this deed's printed production.Shootout Spirit 8, Boot: Choose a dude without a We3apon. That dude has +X bullets. X is this deed's printed production.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: After an opposing dude moves to a deed you own, move your dude to that deed from an adjacent location. This card's ghost rock cost is equal to the opposing dude's influence.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Choose a non-Unique Weapon in your discard pile and attach it to a dude in your posse, paying all costs. Boot a Weapon or Sidekick attached to that dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Technique: Choose a printed ability on a card at this location. That ability cannot be used.Shootout Technique: Choose a printed ability on a card at this shootout. That ability cannot be used until after Sundown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: All Weapons lose their bullet bonuses, traits, and Shootout abilities until the end of this round of the shootout. Dudes with Kung Fu are studs until the end of this round of the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: If draw hand ranks are tied, increase your draw hand rank by 1.Noon: Draw a card and discard a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin' Resolution: Discard the cheatin' player's draw hand and replace it with the top five cards of their deck. If the replacement draw hand is cheatin', take up to 2 ghost rock from that player.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: After your dude is chosen by an opponent's Shootout ability, boot a dude in your posse that could have been chosen. The booted dude is chosen instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon/Shootout: Discard a spell you own and control to choose one of your dudes. That dude has +1 bullets and +1 influence. If the spell was unbooted, gain ghost rock equal to the spell's printed cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Move your unbooted dude to an adjacent location. That dude has +1 influence for controlling deeds until the end of the next Upkeep phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Send a wanted dude home. This card's ghost rock cost is equal to the wanted dude's influence.
